translation.common.loginFailed: Log in failed. Wrong email or password.
translation.common.name: Name
translation.common.layerSwitcherHierarchyTreeDescrip: Drag items from the left panel to build your layerswitcher hierarchy. Groups can contain layers and other groups. You can also drag items within the tree to reorder them.
translation.common.dragLayersAndGroups: Drag layers and groups here to create a hierarchy
translation.roles.adminDescription: Users that are allowed to use Hajks admin interface
translation.roles.superuserDescription: Users that are allowed to create new admin users
translation.services.dialog.title: New service
translation.services.error.url: Error loading layers. The provided url is not valid.
translation.services.settings.dialog.title: Edit url
translation.services.createServiceDuplicateError: A service with this URL and type already exists
translation.services.affectedLayers: If you change the url, it may cause other settings to stop working. The change will affect {{count}} layers.
translation.services.layerInServiceNone: There are no Hajk-layers that uses this service
translation.services.atLeastOneLayerRequired: At least one layer must be selected
translation.user.createUserDescription: Create a user who can log into Hajk. Remember to save the password in a secure place â€” you will never be able to view it here again.
translation.user.createUserFailed: Failed to create user. Contact the system administrator.
translation.user.deleteConfirmation: You are about to delete a user. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.user.deleteUserFailed: Failed to delete user. Contact the system administrator.
translation.user.name: Name
translation.user.passwordAtLeast6Chars: Password must be at least 6 characters
translation.map.centerCoordinateHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'center' parameter, e.g., '110600,6283796'
translation.map.confirmOnWindowClose: Ask the user if Hajk should really be closed
translation.map.confirmOnWindowCloseHelp: If enabled, a confirmation box appears if there are unsaved changes (e.g., ongoing drawing or measurement).
translation.map.constrainOnlyCenterHelp: Controls the ol.View 'constrainOnlyCenter' parameter. If true, only the center coordinate is constrained to the extent.
translation.map.constrainResolution: Lock zoom to set resolutions for desktops
translation.map.constrainResolutionHelp: Controls the ol.View 'constrainResolution' parameter. If true, zooming is limited to defined resolutions.
translation.map.constrainResolutionMobile: Lock zoom to set resolutions for mobile devices
translation.map.constrainResolutionMobileHelp: Controls the ol.View 'constrainResolution' parameter for mobile devices. If true, zooming is limited to defined resolutions.
translation.map.cookieLinkHelp: Optional URL opened with the 'More information' button.
translation.map.cookieMessageHelp: Enter the message shown for cookies.
translation.map.cookieUse3dPartHelp: If enabled, a checkbox for third-party cookies will be shown to new users.
translation.map.crossOriginHelp: Sets the value used for 'crossOrigin'. If unsure, use 'anonymous'.
translation.map.doubleClickZoom: Whether double click zoom is desired
translation.map.drawerButtonIconHelp: Icon on the button that opens the tool. Choose from predefined options.
translation.map.drawerButtonTitleHelp: Text on the button that opens the tool.
translation.map.drawerContentHelp: Controls which drawer content is active on startup.
translation.map.drawerPermanent: Keep the side panel locked at startup
translation.map.drawerPermanentHelp: If enabled, the side panel will be locked to the screen's edge on startup (not applicable to mobile devices).
translation.map.drawerStatic: Keep the side panel permanently visible and locked
translation.map.drawerStaticHelp: If enabled, the side panel will be permanently visible and locked.
translation.map.drawerTitleHelp: Title of the tool panel shown at the top of the side panel.
translation.map.drawerVisible: Start with the side panel visible
translation.map.drawerVisibleHelp: If enabled, the side panel will be visible when the map loads.
translation.map.drawerVisibleMobile: Start with the side panel visible in mobile mode
translation.map.drawerVisibleMobileHelp: If enabled, the side panel will be open but not locked at the screen's edge on startup.
translation.map.enableAppStateInHash: Enable live update of hash parameters in URL field
translation.map.enableAppStateInHashHelp: The map state is continuously updated as part of the URL's hash parameters.
translation.map.enableDownloadLinkHelp: If enabled, a download button will appear next to each layer in the Layer Manager.
translation.map.extentHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'extent' parameter, e.g., '1,2,3,4'
translation.map.introductionEnabled: Start the introduction guide automatically on the user's first visit
translation.map.introductionEnabledHelp: If enabled, an introduction guide will be shown to the user on their first visit.
translation.map.introductionShowControlButton: Show a button in the map to manually start the guide
translation.map.introductionShowControlButtonHelp: If enabled, a button to manually start the guide will be shown next to the zoom buttons.
translation.map.introductionSteps: Steps shown in the introduction guide
translation.map.introductionStepsHelp: A JSON object defining the elements highlighted in the guide. Can be empty to highlight default elements.
translation.map.introJsHelpButtonText: See examples of how to create steps.
translation.map.logoDarkHelp: Path to the logo to use in the tag. Can be relative to the Hajk root or absolute.
translation.map.logoLightHelp: Path to the logo to use in the tag. Can be relative to the Hajk root or absolute.
translation.map.mapcleaner: Show button to clear the map
translation.map.mapcleanerHelp: If enabled, a button to clear the map will be shown.
translation.map.mapresetter: Show a home button that resets the map to the initial state
translation.map.mapresetterHelp: If enabled, a home button will be shown that resets the map to its initial state.
translation.map.mapselectorHelp: If enabled, a selector for available maps will be shown to the user.
translation.map.maxZoomHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'maxZoom' parameter, e.g., '20'
translation.map.minZoomHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'minZoom' parameter, e.g., '0'
translation.map.name: Name
translation.map.onFocusOnly: Interact only when the map has the focus
translation.map.onFocusOnlyHelp: Affects interactions like MouseWheelZoom and DragPan. Useful when page scrolling is desired on maps without focus.
translation.map.originHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'origin' parameter, e.g., '0,0'
translation.map.preferredColorSchemeHelp: Determines whether to follow the user's color scheme preference.
translation.map.printResolutionsHelp: Extra resolutions added to existing ones during printing
translation.map.projectionHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'projection' parameter, e.g., 'EPSG:3008'
translation.map.resolutionsHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'resolutions' parameter, e.g., '4096,2048,1024,512'
translation.map.showCookieNoticeButtonHelp: If enabled, a button that displays the cookie message will appear below the zoom buttons.
translation.map.showCookieNoticeHelp: If enabled, a message about cookie usage will be shown to new users.
translation.map.showRecentlyUsedPlugins: Show a quick selector with the most recently used tools
translation.map.showRecentlyUsedPluginsHelp: A small button that shows the most recently used tools when hovered or touched, allowing the user to activate them.
translation.map.showThemeToggler: Show button to switch between light and dark themes
translation.map.showThemeTogglerHelp: If enabled, a button to switch between light and dark themes will be shown.
translation.map.showUserAvatar: Show a button with the user's initials next to the zoom buttons
translation.map.showUserAvatarHelp: If AD integration is active, an avatar with the user's initials will be shown in the map controls.
translation.map.startZoomHelp: Used as OpenLayers View 'zoom' parameter, e.g., '2'
translation.map.title: Title
translation.map.zoomAnimationDuration: Duration of the zoom animation in milliseconds
translation.map.zoomLevelDelta: Zoom level delta when using keyboard or double click zoom
translation.error.forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this page.
translation.error.notFound.description:
Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. Please check the URL.
Be sure to check your spelling.
translation.error.serverError.description: The server encountered an unexpected problem that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

translation.layers.customDpiDescription: Configure custom DPI values for different pixel ratios
translation.layers.minMaxZoomAlertOnToggleOnly: Only show min/max alert box on click
translation.layers.metadata.title: Title
translation.groups.dialog.title: New group
translation.database.title: Database Management
translation.database.status.title: Database Status
translation.database.status.postgresqlToolsMissing: PostgreSQL tools (pg_dump, pg_restore, psql) are not available on this system. Please install PostgreSQL client tools.
translation.database.export.title: Export Database
translation.database.export.description: Create a backup of your database. Choose the format and options below.
translation.database.export.formats.sql.desc: Human-readable text file. Good for version control and manual edits. Larger and slower.
translation.database.export.formats.custom.desc: Recommended for pg_restore. Fast and compact. Restored with pg_restore.
translation.database.export.formats.tar.desc: Archive format that can contain multiple files. Restored with pg_restore.
translation.database.export.formats.directory.desc: Exports to a folder with multiple files. Good for parallel restore.
translation.database.export.includeData.desc: Export both schema and data. Uncheck to export only the structure.
translation.database.export.schemaOnly.desc: Export only database schema (tables, views, etc.) without data.
translation.database.export.dataOnly.desc: Export only table contents (data) without schema changes.
translation.database.export.compress.desc: Reduce file size (not applicable to directory format).
translation.database.import.title: Import Database
translation.database.import.description: Restore your database from a backup file. This will replace the current database content.
translation.database.import.formats.sql.desc: Used with psql. Executes raw SQL. Suitable for simpler imports.
translation.database.import.formats.custom.desc: Recommended. Restore with pg_restore. Fast and reliable.
translation.database.import.formats.tar.desc: Binary export packaged as TAR. Restored with pg_restore.
translation.database.import.formats.directory.desc: Import from a folder with multiple files. Supports parallel restore.
translation.database.import.cleanDescription: Drop existing objects before importing (WARNING: This will delete all current data)
translation.database.import.clean.desc: If off and objects already exist, the import may fail.
translation.database.import.noFileSelected: Please select a file to import
translation.database.import.fileReadError: Failed to read the selected file
translation.database.exports.title: Available Exports
translation.database.exports.table.name: Name
translation.database.import.logoutMessage: You will be logged out automatically to refresh the application with the new data.
translation.database.import.logoutToast: You will be logged out to refresh the application with the new data. Please log in again.
translation.database.import.loginPageMessage: Database has been updated. Please log in again to see the changes.
translation.database.import.error.conflict: Database objects already exist. Enable 'Clean Before Import' to replace existing data, or choose a different database.

resultDisplayOptions.autoShowAllResultsOnMap: Auto show all results on map
